website_summaries.verdict: It performs well enough, but there are similar rollers on the market at a much lower price.
pros: Caters to users who want a gentle massage roller that won't go flat over time

customer_reviews.title: Love it - slightly softer than hard styrafoam models
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard foam roller and its great. I tried this roller which is firm but has a little give. I like it and added it to the hard foam roller so I can use either depending on my needs. Its good! Comes with a pamphlet on how to roll.
customer_reviews.author: Cosmo Weems

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction and a for storage friendly size than the ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction and a for storage friendly size than the 5-6ft options. The red foam provided a medium amount of resistance. Ideal for newcomers to foam rolling who may find the harder black foam creates to much pain initially.
customer_reviews.author: AvidReader

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to roll on my back and my hip and it helps for sure worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son and he says it’s a life changer. We both have one now. Great for stretching and relieving back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Walls

customer_reviews.title: The Best Roller
customer_reviews.text: Great size for the average male. My taller boyfriend like this one a lot. I prefer the smaller red size as a tall female. Love the color and quality of both GoFit rollers. I've had my red one for years and it is in perfect condition and I highly recommend these rollers.
customer_reviews.author: SillySamantha

customer_reviews.title: actually hurt my back worse..
customer_reviews.text: Advice: start out slowwww....this one is really firm, actually hurt my back worse...after my initial injury was healed..THEN it worked well, my advice would be to get a softer one to start with then move up to this firm one...Now I Love it..just had to adjust to it Slowly
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product to help with back and leg pain.
customer_reviews.author: Lara Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Great for helping back pain as well
customer_reviews.text: We puchased this becuase a friend of ours (who has back issues) used this to help aleviate her back pain (by rolling back and forth several times once a day). So far it has definitly helped my wife. It is no magic fix, but seems to help allign stuff (note if you don't like your back cracking while rolling don't by this! ) I think we could have goten by with the shorter one, as somestimes it is hard to find a wide enough floor area to use this. But overall we have been very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Smith

customer_reviews.title: Workout necessity
customer_reviews.text: I love this roller! I got this size so that I could bring it with me to the different gyms and studios I go to. I use it after cardio, which is usually followed by weight training, and then again after weights. It gives the deep tissue style massage which alleviates that super painful lactic acid buildup. I have not had the problem of it flattening out beyond use. Since it is made of pliable, porous foam I expect it to compress a little over time bit mine is still good as new! I highly recommend this product for anyone who wants a more complete workout.
customer_reviews.author: JKM_GBM

customer_reviews.title: Streeeetttccchhhhhh..... ahhhh.
customer_reviews.text: omg... this thing makes my back feel so much better. The first time I rolled across it my back cracked in like 5 places. Felt so good. I have fibromyalgia though, and some of the other excercises seem to be a little too much for me. Still, I love it, and would buy it again if mine were to disappear.
customer_reviews.author: ShoppingForThePerfect....

customer_reviews.title: this thing is awesome it was a life saver for me
customer_reviews.text: this thing is awesome it was a life saver for me. I hurt my back a few years ago and when my back was finally starting to get back to normal I started working out and it started to hurt a ton again I saw this thing at the crossfit gym one day and I had to order one for myself. it is a lifesaver.
customer_reviews.author: 300blackoutguy

customer_reviews.title: Firm but not hard resistance
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for most men and women. Firm but not hard resistance. Just like the one in the gym
customer_reviews.author: John S. Noxon

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who is a runner and lately is having some back problems. The foam roller came with a DVD on how to use showing appropriate methods. The first couple of uses are a little painful, but that's because he was working out the kinks in his muscles. After using this for a couple of months, his back is much better and he is only using it a couple times a week now instead of every day.
customer_reviews.author: TheMadBaker

customer_reviews.title: Good for Tight Muscles
customer_reviews.text: I found it works good for loosening tight muscles. I have other brands of foam rollers in other sizes. So far mine is holding up fine after a few weeks of use and this one seems of comparable quality to my other rollers.] are also helpful for muscle loosening. I use those in addition to the foam rollers.
customer_reviews.author: Soccerfan

customer_reviews.title: Not a long-term investment
customer_reviews.text: This foam roller is not dense enough to survive repeated use. The foam compresses when you put your weight on it, but it does not return to its original shape. The best part about this purchase was the instructional video that comes with it. To be fair: it might be OK if you plan to use it once in a while, but I was using it 2-3x a week.
customer_reviews.author: Sheilah Q.

customer_reviews.title: I wish there was a manual to show me how to correctly use it!
customer_reviews.text: No manual included. I was so bummed ! Irritating! Who has time to return it and hope next time it includes a manual or instructions!! Another silly purchase😡
customer_reviews.author: L C E

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Use it daily! Perfect hardness and perfect length. Durable
customer_reviews.author: alexandra tovshteyn

customer_reviews.title: Just the right amount of cushion and firmness
customer_reviews.text: I use under my back to roll out the kinks frequently. The surface has just the right amount of cushion to make it comfortable, but it is firm enough to get the job done. I have another roll that is very durable, but just too hard to be comfortable. I do not use it as often.
customer_reviews.author: Livingston Holder

customer_reviews.title: GoFit Foam Roller
customer_reviews.text: An excellent product, our first one lasted 12 yrs before needing to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Hikeforfun

customer_reviews.title: Gym Quality Roller
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, just right firmness and size. Is as good as the ones at my gym and great to have at home for times when the gym doesn't fit my schedule. These rollers are great for working out the kinks and massage any part of your body.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R Davis

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: After using a similar product at the gym and at a friends, I ordered this one on-line at a price similar to what they had paid. I was surprised to find mine was larger and of equal or better quality and cost less. It was a great bang for the buck. My wife uses it for back pain and I use it for massage and stretching.
customer_reviews.author: Topnish

customer_reviews.title: Nice....but very long!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice foam roller. Keep in mind that it is very long....so if you are a short woman, you might want to get something smaller. I'm 6'1'' and it works for me, but my wife at 5'4'' would probably be better off with a 24 incher. Still, it does exactly what I wanted it to do. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: M. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Good foam roller
customer_reviews.text: If you've never tried a roller after a hard workout, you're in for a treat. It almost feels like a deep tissue massage. This roller is fine for the money, but it does compress fairly rapidly. My husband and I (both slim) have used it about 30 times, and the middle section is now indented.
customer_reviews.author: Linda J. Konrad

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ROLLER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this foam roller. My previous one was 36" in length and difficult to use as it was too long. Also the book that comes with this roller shows many different exercises. We didn't get that with the previous one.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Hour glass
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 36 inch GoFit red foam roller and I loved it but it turned from a cylinder to an hour glass revolved around its long axis! This happened after 1 month use. It did not regain its original shape. It was great while it lasted. How can I use it now?
customer_reviews.author: 999999anonymous999999

customer_reviews.title: Good massage, but deflates over time
customer_reviews.text: This is a good roller, and I own 2 now, but they both soften over time, especially when I do a stacked leg roll. I am still amazed how well this works for recovery and lossening the leg/hip muscles helps with my lower back.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Maresh

customer_reviews.title: Great Roller
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality roller. I like the fact that comes with a DVD that shows you how you can use the roller... I bought it mostly to massage my IT band as I have knee problems.... I think it started to help already after using for 1 week. Highly Recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: CarlaVeg

customer_reviews.title: Great cheap roller
customer_reviews.text: Used several times a week by 2 people over the last year and it's holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Works
customer_reviews.text: Works great for the IT band. I've had this for several months now and it shows no wear and tear. I like the small size it's easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Good foam roller
customer_reviews.text: Firm enough to get the knots out of my tendons, soft enough to not cause too much pain, a must have for marathon runners with TB band issues.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Great roller
customer_reviews.text: My husband and my son, who works out all the time, each have one of these and use them daily to stretch out their backs.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Good roller
customer_reviews.text: I do really like this roller, and I like that it came with a video to show me how to use it since I had never had one before. I feel like it has lost some of it's shape (is a bit squished) after not much use, and I'm not very big (about 120lbs). Some others might be sturdier. When I buy a new one I will look for something sturdier, but this was good for a first-time user.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Go FIt Foam Roller
customer_reviews.text: It works! So many stetches you can do. Utube has videos you can watch and the the roller comes with a CD as well best money I ever spent on any product. Can take knots out of your back Upper and Lower. This Product ROCKS.
customer_reviews.author: GroovyRN

customer_reviews.title: Training for a marathon?
customer_reviews.text: My husband swears by this thing. He is an adventure racer, who is currently training for the Iron Man race. I do not know much about the product, but he uses it consistently and is very pleased with the results.
customer_reviews.author: amjackel

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product, but I thought it was priced a bit high for a piece of roll foam with a decal printed on it. Oh well, it gets used with all the other things in my workout room. It does take some getting used to.
customer_reviews.author: spatin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this product. It has entirely removed recurring hip pain caused by her frequent running. Also, the product is very durable and has held up to some torture from our dog. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: A. Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Lower Back Issues
customer_reviews.text: Maybe a little pricey for what it is, but it sure works for me. Just a couple of minutes 2 or 3 times a day and it releives all of the stress in my lower back. It is instant, albeit temporary relief from my lower back strain and posture issues.
customer_reviews.author: kenb7

customer_reviews.title: Huge improvement with continuous use
customer_reviews.text: Both my father and I have found that using this foam roller improves our back and shoulder pain. It loosens muscles within a couple minutes - amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Molly W.

customer_reviews.title: It's as good as any roller
customer_reviews.text: It's as good as any roller. Don't be fooled by the "laminated book" that comes with it. It's not like the one depicted. It's black and white and a small paper copy stapled together. Of course the foam rollers aren't too hard to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Bob z

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This roller has the right amount of firmness for me not to soft not to hard and yet it maintains its shape very well.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase....
customer_reviews.text: I really like the foam roller and I use it all the time. The only reason, why I gave 'only' 4 stars, instead of the DVD, I would have prefered a printed cheat sheet for the exercises instead.
customer_reviews.author: Kathrin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Roller
customer_reviews.text: Great foam roller. Theyuse this one at my gym and i loved it so much i had to have one.
customer_reviews.author: phoebe

customer_reviews.title: It helps to feel better the next day
customer_reviews.text: If you have back pain, you should get this. I spend time on it after work when my back is at it's tightest. It helps to feel better the next day.
customer_reviews.author: David Glass

customer_reviews.title: nice addition to regular workouts
customer_reviews.text: What you see is exactly what you get--it's a piece of foam. That being said, this roller is a positive addition to your recovery period. Basically, it massages your muscles as you roll on it. The process isn't always comfortable in the beginning, but eventually it starts to feel excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Educated Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Good device
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help stretch out my back and to get rid of the soreness from leg exercises. It does a very good job and doesn't take up a lot of room.
customer_reviews.author: W.C.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I have not watched the DVD. I read up on the procedures and it definately stretches and massages you better than you would yourself or any other amateur. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: French. Fam

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Everyone should own this. It will help release tension in your back and neck. It also comes with a DVD to help you work every part of your body.
customer_reviews.author: Dawnimal

customer_reviews.title: Use it daily
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to keep the pain out of my knees and total body......my IT Band is so happy, and so am I!!!!
customer_reviews.author: BodybyDesign

customer_reviews.title: like this
customer_reviews.text: what a joke... shell out a few more bucks for the triggerpoint roller.. that one wont wear out over time, like this one
customer_reviews.author: roberto colon

customer_reviews.title: good but needed it to be bit more hard
customer_reviews.text: I have a lower back injury so I use it to massage my back and legs. It is good but if it was harder then what it is then it would have better. It is hard but it is not as hard as I would like. Also it is too expensive for a foam roller but I paid more because amazon is not selling a lot of these in this particular shape and size.
customer_reviews.author: Rahul Agrawal

customer_reviews.title: Great for Fitness
customer_reviews.text: Great for tight hamstrings - the reason I bought it. Also, works well for other parts of the body. Will continually buy products from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Di T

customer_reviews.title: Not the best out there
customer_reviews.text: This roller lasted for a short time before it lost its firmness. I would not recommend this if you are a avid runner. There are others out there that have a harder inner core wrapped with a softer outer foam.
customer_reviews.author: Fred J. Lopiccolo

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: Description says it comes with a DVD. It doesn't. I even returned it explaining that there was no DVD, they sent me a second one but it didn't have a DVD either.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The foam didn't break down quickly which I was afraid of. I've now used it for several years and am still happy.
customer_reviews.author: frog lady

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my therapist thinks you for the product it's doing me wonders
customer_reviews.author: Elena Kissel

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Three years of knee trouble, over $1000 in physical therapy sessions and at last I am taking matters into my own hand. The first thing on my list to buy was the foam roller that I used to decent effect in physical therapy. This one fits the bill perfectly. Firm enough to provide a solid platform for my leg rolls, after a few minutes of rolling the pain from my iliotibial muscle starts to dissipate. For anybody with IBS (Iliotibial Band Syndrome) this is an absolute must. For those with minor back pain, again, this will be a big help. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: GoFit Foam Roller
customer_reviews.text: This is a smaller version of the foam rollers in my gym. It is more convenient for storage in my room, and a little softer, which is more forgiving on muscles. It's a great tool for runners and I would highly recommend it for anyone to soothe the back and tight muscles, and for core strength.
customer_reviews.author: Erin L. Henshaw

customer_reviews.title: Aaaaahhhh!
customer_reviews.text: So much easier to "roll yourself out" with this than with the smaller bar rollers -- and it feels wonderful! The instructions and DVD make additional manuals unnecessary. I'm looking forward to trying some of the more thorough workouts recommended.
customer_reviews.author: MWA

customer_reviews.title: A Perfect Means of Relief
customer_reviews.text: This foam roller helps me to reach the areas in the shoulder blades that I found difficult to relieve the pain. It also provides the means to reach the sore muscles on the outside of my legs.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Korgie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just the right degree of firmness. Love the 18-inch length for easy rolling.
customer_reviews.author: KarenB

customer_reviews.title: Foam Roller is great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this foam roller after completing physical therapy. It works wonderfully at loosening my IT band, which was the cause of tremendous hip pain that I was having. I also use it on my calves and back when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Foam exercise roller
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item to add to your exercise routine. The rigid foam roller works great under your knees or ankles when doing exercise. Well worth the money - I was glad to give up the rolled up towel!
customer_reviews.author: Mother of Many

customer_reviews.title: It's a good pain to relieve pain.
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using this product for a few weeks but have noticed a difference. Really helps work out the knots in my hamstrings and thighs in between sports massages.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: It is a good
customer_reviews.text: although it is a little bit expensive, but it totally worth it. It is a good product
customer_reviews.author: Qiyuan

customer_reviews.title: Great Roller!
customer_reviews.text: This GoFit 36-inch roller is great for self muscle massage. The accompanying DVD shows a number of ways to get at each muscle group. Worth the investment. Sue G
customer_reviews.author: Bruce and Sue in Maine

customer_reviews.title: Rollers Work really Well!
customer_reviews.text: get one, they work, if you are any kind of athlete you need one of these.
customer_reviews.author: jon snow

customer_reviews.title: very good! :)
customer_reviews.text: found a lot of parts of my body that are aching!! even it is a nice relief for neck and head/neck junction!! my back feels so much better now!
customer_reviews.author: Vio

customer_reviews.title: No pain No Gain
customer_reviews.text: My I.T. Band was sore and stiff. The pain which came from the initial rubbing is gone. I use it after rowing and biking.
customer_reviews.author: Summer bound

customer_reviews.title: Roller
customer_reviews.text: Great product, simple and easy to use. Took awhile to get the hang of it, but I use it daily to maintain a healthier back. Great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my father in law. Not sure how much he uses it but tells me he likes it.
customer_reviews.author: PILRBNQ

customer_reviews.title: Foam great, DVD worthless
customer_reviews.text: The foam roller is great but the DVD doesn't provide much. I was expecting it to be an interactive routine rather than just how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: fit

customer_reviews.title: Suitable for lumberjacks
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this item because it is SO wide in circumference that it would only be suitable for someone who is about 6 feet tall and weighs more than 250lbs. I had been looking for a roller to lie on down my spine to help with issues there, like what I use in P.T. At 5'4" and under 150 lbs, trying that maneuver with this product was like lying on a styrofoam life preserver.
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Ray

customer_reviews.title: Foam roller works great. But the package is called GoFit 24-Inch GoFit ...
customer_reviews.text: Foam roller works great. But the package is called GoFit 24-Inch GoFit Foam Roller with Training Manual, Blue. "With training manual" - I did not get a training manual with my foam roller. :(
customer_reviews.author: shopswaytoomuch

customer_reviews.title: Not firm enough.  Not for crossfit
customer_reviews.text: I've used foam rollers at various gyms and thought this would be nice to have at home. I just received it and it's already heading back via UPS. It's just not firm enough for me and is not what you find in professional gyms. I'm a crossfitter and want something firm. I'm going with Nimbus Endurabead products instead of this.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Heads up!
customer_reviews.text: This item is not as pictured. It is not oval, but is in fact a round foam roller. Not a word of this in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

product_meta.title: GoFit Foam Roller with Training Manual
feature_bullets: The GoFit Foam Roller is great for both pre workout and post workout usage!
DENSITY: The GoFit Foam Roller is just the right firmness and density to assist with recovery after a strenuous workout or to help relieve pain.
GREAT FOR: The GoFit Foam Roller is great for personal trainers, physical therapists, and at home use!
SIZES: The GoFit Foam Roller is available in an 18 inch size, 24 inch size, or a 36 inch size depending on your rolling needs.
MANUAL: In the included Training Manual, you’ll find effective exercises for all types of deep tissue muscle recovery and unique strength-training moves you just can’t do using standard rollers.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
